mapper.select: SELECT A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매진행순서 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분 */ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호(바코드, 귀표번호) */ , A.COW_SOG_WT /* 우출하중량 */ , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM /* 최저낙찰한도금액 */ , C.TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인관리번호 */ , C.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO /* 가축경매참여자번호 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN D.SRA_MWMNNM WHEN LENGTH(D.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(D.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(D.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(D.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(D.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(D.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.SRA_MWMNNM) = 5 THEN SUBSTR(D.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /* 중도매인명 */ , CASE WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' THEN C.ATDR_AM * #{calf_auc_atdr_unt_am} WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '2' THEN C.ATDR_AM * #{nbfct_auc_atdr_unt_am} WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '3' THEN C.ATDR_AM * #{ppgcow_auc_atdr_unt_am} END AS ATDR_AM /* 응찰금액 */ , TO_CHAR(C.ATDR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AS ATDR_DTM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MH_ATDR_LOG C , TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN D WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND (C.TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmn_amnno} OR #{trmn_amnno} is null) AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE C.AUC_OBJ_DSC END AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND C.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND C.TRMN_AMNNO = D.TRMN_AMNNO ORDER BY A.AUC_PRG_SQ, ATDR_DTM, C.TRMN_AMNNO
